Then, suddenly, three beautiful women named Ciel, Anemone and Goa invite him to join their party! Toto's motivation is high when he embarks on his long-awaited adventure, but his companions are full of desire to kill him?! This is a harem DEATH rom-com about an extremely shy hero who passes out in the mere presence of women, and the three women who try to kill him for their own purposes!!

synopsis: Twenty-five years after a college student vanishes—leaving only the first joint of her finger behind—the case remains unsolved. Her twin brother, now a local police officer, is forced to team up with a transferred elite cop he doesn’t get along with. When a call leads them to search for a missing elderly man, they uncover clues that may finally unravel the long-buried truth.

title: Tidstjuven
cast: Gusten Wickberg, Blanca Eliasson, Simon J. Berger, Maja Rung, Lisette Pagler
synopsis: Ever since Clint's father Pontus disappeared on Christmas Eve five years ago, Clint has loathed Christmas. But everything changes when a mysterious man appears in his closet and drops a time spy. When Clint tries the binoculars, he sees his father stuck in ancient times. At the same time, strange things begin to happen - Gustav Vasa steps out of the closet, misplaced by 500 years. With the help of the time viewer, Clint embarks on a breathtaking adventure to save his father, where he travels through history.

title: Jackrabbit
cast: Rayan Hamda Barhoumi, Clémence Valette, Alexandre Darcourt, Alexandre Darcourt, Karim Bensalem
synopsis:
In a city plagued by corruption and impunity, Rogue Majedri, a former military man turned computer scientist, leads a double life. Officially a cybersecurity consultant, he secretly hunts criminals who have been released by the law. Nicknamed "Jackrabbit" for his quick thinking and ability to disappear without a trace, Rogue uses his military intelligence skills to infiltrate, intercept, and neutralize.

Through a series of dark investigations and intimate confrontations, Jackrabbit explores the limits of personal justice, the aftermath of trauma, and the blurred line between revenge and redemption. But as he delves deeper into the digital and human underbelly, Rogue realizes he may be just a pawn in a much larger game…
tags: espionage, political, thriller, startup, drama, adventure, social-issue, detective, historical, crime, sci-fi, documentary, superhero, noir, revenge
text_input:
In a city plagued by corruption and impunity, Rogue Majedri, a former military man turned computer scientist, leads a double life. Officially a cybersecurity consultant, he secretly hunts criminals who have been released by the law. Nicknamed "Jackrabbit" for his quick thinking and ability to disappear without a trace, Rogue uses his military intelligence skills to infiltrate, intercept, and neutralize.

Through a series of dark investigations and intimate confrontations, Jackrabbit explores the limits of personal justice, the aftermath of trauma, and the blurred line between revenge and redemption. But as he delves deeper into the digital and human underbelly, Rogue realizes he may be just a pawn in a much larger game… Drama, Action & Adventure, Crime, Mystery

title: Tidstjuven

synopsis: Ever since Clint's father Pontus disappeared on Christmas Eve five years ago, Clint has loathed Christmas. But everything changes when a mysterious man appears in his closet and drops a time spy. When Clint tries the binoculars, he sees his father stuck in ancient times. At the same time, strange things begin to happen - Gustav Vasa steps out of the closet, misplaced by 500 years. With the help of the time viewer, Clint embarks on a breathtaking adventure to save his father, where he travels through history.

title: Shifty
cast: unknown
synopsis: This series shows in a new and imaginative way how over the past 40 years in Britain extreme money and hyper-individualism came together in an unspoken alliance. Together they undermined one of the fundamental structures of mass democracy - that it could create a shared idea of what was real. And as that fell apart, with it went the language and the ideas that people had turned to for the last 150 years to make sense of the world they lived in.

synopsis: The author of the zero hit Nikolai Larionov works as a security guard of country villages. But one day his ex-wife Jeanne flies away on vacation and asks to look after their 14-year-old daughter Kasha, whom he has never seen. The teenager is not happy about the appearance of an infantile sloppy father and dreams of getting rid of him by placing him in good female hands. Unexpectedly, Cauchy's idea gives birth to a profitable business — an online dating agency. The new case will not only bring father and daughter closer together, but also help solve their financial problems: Kosha will negotiate with a blackmailer at school, and Nikolai will triumphantly return to show business.

title: Slovan Bratislava: Cesta za snom
cast: Vladimír Weiss st., Juraj Kucka, Róbert Mak, Tigran Barseghjan, Vladimír Weiss ml.
synopsis:
The Slovan brand has explosive power in Slovak football. It will always be in the spotlight, it will always resonate in articles, discussions, households, and streets. Beloved and constantly commented on, a club that arouses the strongest passions and is definitely not indifferent to anyone.

For the first time in history, film cameras have managed to penetrate behind the scenes of the functioning of our most successful club, to the immediate emotions of players, fans, and to the genuine football drama taking place in the background of matches. Slovan is finally opening its doors. In times when winning the title is considered a duty, when it must set only the highest ambitions, but it also faces many challenges. The series will take the viewer behind the curtain and during an unforgettable season will reveal the absolute behind-the-scenes of the millionaire Champions League - in the historic year in which Slovan ranked among the elite of world football.

title: INCOMING: the game
cast: unknown
synopsis: the horrifying and suspense-filled world of a deadly survival game that pulls six teenagers from various backgrounds into a nightmare. After a humiliating incident at his high school reunion, Bright, a brilliant but financially struggling teen, is lured into an Instagram ad that promises an easy way to make money. What he doesn’t know is that this click will entrap him and his friends into a game with no rules, where survival becomes the ultimate goal. As the game starts to haunt them in their everyday lives, the teens must navigate challenges, betrayals, and deadly consequences while trying to uncover the mystery behind the sinister game.

title: Tu Aashiikii Haii
cast: Amandeep Sidhu, Abishek Kumar
synopsis: Pumma & Noor live out a love that feels incredibly real — a connection woven with stolen glances, unspoken promises, and all the breathtaking moments that make a heart truly soar. This is the kind of romance that reminds us why we believe in magic, in finding that one person who simply fits.
